name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Business identifiers assigned to this communication request by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

name: $addidentifier
desc: Business identifiers assigned to this communication request by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Business identifiers assigned to this communication request by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

name: $basedOn
desc: Returns: A plan or proposal that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this request.

name: $addbasedOn
desc: A plan or proposal that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this request.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A plan or proposal that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this request.

name: $replaces
desc: Returns: Completed or terminated request(s) whose function is taken by this new request.

name: $addreplaces
desc: Completed or terminated request(s) whose function is taken by this new request.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Completed or terminated request(s) whose function is taken by this new request.

name: $groupIdentifier
desc: Returns: A shared identifier common to all requests that were authorized more or less simultaneously by a single author, representing the identifier of the requisition, prescription or similar form.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A shared identifier common to all requests that were authorized more or less simultaneously by a single author, representing the identifier of the requisition, prescription or similar form.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The status of the proposal or order.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The status of the proposal or order.

name: $statusReason
desc: Returns: Captures the reason for the current state of the CommunicationRequest.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Captures the reason for the current state of the CommunicationRequest.

name: $category
desc: Returns: The type of message to be sent such as alert, notification, reminder, instruction, etc.

name: $addcategory
desc: The type of message to be sent such as alert, notification, reminder, instruction, etc.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The type of message to be sent such as alert, notification, reminder, instruction, etc.

name: $priority
desc: Returns: Characterizes how quickly the proposed act must be initiated. Includes concepts such as stat, urgent, routine.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Characterizes how quickly the proposed act must be initiated. Includes concepts such as stat, urgent, routine.

name: $doNotPerform
desc: Returns: If true indicates that the CommunicationRequest is asking for the specified action to *not* occur.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: If true indicates that the CommunicationRequest is asking for the specified action to *not* occur.

name: $medium
desc: Returns: A channel that was used for this communication (e.g. email, fax).

name: $addmedium
desc: A channel that was used for this communication (e.g. email, fax).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A channel that was used for this communication (e.g. email, fax).

name: $subject
desc: Returns: The patient or group that is the focus of this communication request.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The patient or group that is the focus of this communication request.

name: $about
desc: Returns: Other resources that pertain to this communication request and to which this communication request should be associated.

name: $addabout
desc: Other resources that pertain to this communication request and to which this communication request should be associated.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Other resources that pertain to this communication request and to which this communication request should be associated.

name: $encounter
desc: Returns: The Encounter during which this CommunicationRequest was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The Encounter during which this CommunicationRequest was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.

name: $payload
desc: Returns: Text, attachment(s), or resource(s) to be communicated to the recipient.

name: $addpayload
desc: Text, attachment(s), or resource(s) to be communicated to the recipient.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Text, attachment(s), or resource(s) to be communicated to the recipient.

name: $authoredOn
desc: Returns: For draft requests, indicates the date of initial creation.  For requests with other statuses, indicates the date of activation.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: For draft requests, indicates the date of initial creation.  For requests with other statuses, indicates the date of activation.

name: $requester
desc: Returns: The device, individual, or organization who initiated the request and has responsibility for its activation.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The device, individual, or organization who initiated the request and has responsibility for its activation.

name: $recipient
desc: Returns: The entity (e.g. person, organization, clinical information system, device, group, or care team) which is the intended target of the communication.

name: $addrecipient
desc: The entity (e.g. person, organization, clinical information system, device, group, or care team) which is the intended target of the communication.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The entity (e.g. person, organization, clinical information system, device, group, or care team) which is the intended target of the communication.

name: $sender
desc: Returns: The entity (e.g. person, organization, clinical information system, or device) which is to be the source of the communication.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The entity (e.g. person, organization, clinical information system, or device) which is to be the source of the communication.

name: $reasonCode
desc: Returns: Describes why the request is being made in coded or textual form.

name: $addreasonCode
desc: Describes why the request is being made in coded or textual form.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Describes why the request is being made in coded or textual form.

name: $reasonReference
desc: Returns: Indicates another resource whose existence justifies this request.

name: $addreasonReference
desc: Indicates another resource whose existence justifies this request.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates another resource whose existence justifies this request.

name: $note
desc: Returns: Comments made about the request by the requester, sender, recipient, subject or other participants.

name: $addnote
desc: Comments made about the request by the requester, sender, recipient, subject or other participants.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Comments made about the request by the requester, sender, recipient, subject or other participants.
